results.title: Need for increased awareness for avoiding metformin treatment in malnourished older adults with diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Need for increased awareness for avoiding @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment in @<m>DISEASE_Malnutrition</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044342 @@@malnourished@@@ older adults with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@.

citations.NLM: Bahat G, Erdogan T, Karan MA. Need for increased awareness for avoiding metformin treatment in malnourished older adults with diabetes mellitus. Clin Nutr. 2020 Jan;39(1):322. PMID: 31668720

results.title: Management of type 2 diabetes mellitus in older adults: eight case studies with focus SGLT-2 inhibitors and metformin.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: The findings of our case studies suggest considering SGLT-2 inhibitors in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with accompanying @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@/high cardiovascular risk factors and cessation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in those with @<m>DISEASE_Malnutrition</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044342 @@@malnutrition@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Malnutrition</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044342 @@@malnutrition@@@ risk.

citations.NLM: Bahat G, Catikkas NM, Karan MA, Petrovic M. Management of type 2 diabetes mellitus in older adults: eight case studies with focus SGLT-2 inhibitors and metformin. Acta Clin Belg. 2022 Aug;77(4):727-734. PMID: 34251983
citations.BibTeX: @article{34251983, title={Management of type 2 diabetes mellitus in older adults: eight case studies with focus SGLT-2 inhibitors and metformin.}, author={Bahat G and Catikkas NM and Karan MA and Petrovic M}, journal={Acta Clin Belg}, volume={77}, number={4}, pages={727-734}}

results.title: Plasmapheresis as an Early Treatment for Severe Hypertriglyceridemia, Acute Pancreatitis, and Diabetic Ketoacidosis
results.text_hl: We present the case of a severely @<m>DISEASE_Malnutrition</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044342 @@@malnourished@@@ 16-year-old with a 10-month history of presumed @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ managed with lifestyle modifications and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, who presented with @DISEASE_Severe_Acute_Respiratory_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D045169 @@@SHTG@@@, @DISEASE_Pancreatitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@acute pancreatitis@@@, and @DISEASE_Diabetic_Ketoacidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D016883 @@@DKA@@@.

citations.NLM: Kravetz AM, Sanghavi P, Bhargava V, Shi RZ, Nally LM. Plasmapheresis as an Early Treatment for Severe Hypertriglyceridemia, Acute Pancreatitis, and Diabetic Ketoacidosis AACE Clin Case Rep. 2021 Sep-Oct;7(5):315-319. PMID: 34522772

results.title: A case of Donohue syndrome "Leprechaunism" with a novel mutation in the insulin receptor gene.
results.text_hl: However, severe @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy@@@ and severe @<m>DISEASE_Malnutrition</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044342 @@@malnutrition@@@ developed.
